name: The Business Trip
description:
Three Days, Three Flights, Two Cities.  Welcome to my world. 

Whilst most of my YouTube flight reviews are on international trips flying in business class the reality is that over half my flights every year are on road warrior trips within Australia - flying from Adelaide to Sydney, Melbourne and Brisbane.  

There's nothing glamorous about these trips but they play an important part in our business success.   So this time I thought I'd invite you along.

Here are the weblinks to our touring businesses:

Bunnik Tours:  https://www.bunniktours.com.au/ 
The Small Group Touring Co:  https://smallgrouptouringco.com

Enjoy, and as always, happy travels!

cheers

Dennis

p.s.:  at the end of this video I also have some very exciting 'Just Booked' information.  
p.s.s.:  if you're new here please take a moment to check out my channel and subscribe - lots of interesting flight reviews up there and more on the way.
